steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
steps.modified_description: Pour 1 egg into any large cup

errors.description: large cup instead of ramekin cup

steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.modified_description: Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 10 seconds

steps.description: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.modified_description: Top cup with 1/2 tablespoon of salsa

steps.description: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
steps.modified_description: pour 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup

steps.description: Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
replace -replace the top of the English muffin
steps.modified_description: flip over the top muffin and re-place it on top

errors.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
